page.title: Phrases from The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

Line 65: Line 65:
===42 Puzzle===
===42 Puzzle===
â
[[Image:Hitchhiker's Guide (book cover).jpg|frame|The 42 Puzzle on the cover of a late 1990s U.S. printing of The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy - with a rock formation in the background that is the number 42 at a slight angle]]
 
The '''42 Puzzle''' is a game devised by [[Douglas Adams]] in 1994 for the [[United States]] series of ''[[The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy]]'' books. The puzzle is an illustration consisting of 42 multi-coloured balls, in 7 columns and 6 rows. Douglas Adams has said,
